SEARCH
Package com.dhk.model

Class DhkModel

java.lang.Object
com.dhk.model.DhkModel
public class DhkModel extends Object
This class is the primary model of Display Hot Keys. Each slot in the application is initialized here.
Version:
1.5.1
Author:
Jonathan Miller
License:
The MIT License
Copyright:
Jonathan Miller 2025
